cleaned_text: 09:16 PM IST] Vaccines alone not enough, people need yoga and ayurveda: Ramdev Ramdev yet again questioned the efficacy of allopathy against Covid-19 and said people need to supplements such as yoga and ayurveda [] Questioning the efficacy of allopathy against Covid-19 yet again, Yoga guru Ramdev said on Thursday that vaccination alone is not enough to protect people from the virus.
